thread.title: Girish Puthenchery's lyrics for a new film song
thread.title_full: Girish Puthenchery's lyrics for a new film song - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: Girish Puthenchery's lyrics for a new film song
text:
After five years of his demise, Malayalees will have a chance to relish a song written by their favorite lyricist, Girish Puthenchery in Pradeepan Mullanezhi's upcoming film, 'Nammukore Akasham'.
The lyricist who has gifted Malayalam cinema many unforgettable numbers had written this song in 2000 for another film which never happened. The song, Kili paadum ... is sung by KS Chitra and composed by Nagesh Shanker.
